text: Tarapara tadera lajjasthana, ya tadera kache gopana rakha hayechila ta tadera kache prakasa karara jan'ya sayatana taderake kumantrana dila ebam balala, ‘pache tomara ubhaya phiris‌ta haye ya'o kimba tomara sthayidera antarbhukta ha'o, e jan'ye'i tomadera raba e gacha theke tomaderake nisedha karechena.’
